bhalisa: Indawo yenkumbulo encane, eshesha kakhulu ngaphakathi kwe-CPU
funda inkumbulo kuphela: Igcina imiyalelo ebalulekile ukuze ikhompuyutha iqale
inkumbulo yenqolobane: Inkumbulo encane, esheshayo eseduze ne-CPU ukuze ufinyelele ngokushesha
usayizi wegama: Inombolo yamabhithi i-CPU engawacubungula ngesikhathi esisodwa
iphayiphi: Isu lapho i-CPU yephula imiyalelo ibe yizigaba ukuze isebenze kweziningi ngesikhathi esisodwa
ukucubungula okuningi: Ukusebenzisa ama-CPU amaningi noma ama-cores ukwenza imisebenzi ngesikhathi esisodwa
phazamisa: Isignali emisa okwesikhashana i-CPU ukuze isingathe umcimbi
inkumbulo ebonakalayo: Isu lokusebenzisa isikhala sediski eliqinile njengesandiso se-RAM
i-bios: I-Basic Input/Output System, i-firmware eqalisa i-hardware ekuqaleni
i/o port: Ikheli eliqondile kukhompuyutha yokuxhumana namadivaysi e-peripheral
umshayeli wedivayisi: Isofthiwe evumela isistimu yokusebenza ukuthi ilawule idivayisi
Iphrothokholi yenethiwekhi: Iqoqo lemithetho namazinga okuxhumana phakathi kwamadivaysi
umzila: Idivayisi edlulisela phambili amaphakethe phakathi kwamanethiwekhi ahlukene
imaski ye-subnet: Isetshenziselwa ukunquma inethiwekhi kanye nezingxenye zokusingatha zekheli le-IP
imodeli yeseva yeklayenti: Isakhiwo senethiwekhi lapho amaklayenti acela khona izinsiza kumaseva
dma: Ukufinyelela inkumbulo okuqondile, kuvumela amadivayisi ukudlulisa idatha ngaphandle kokusebenzisa i-CPU
